Posts.Content: Jan 11, 2010 08:13AM Claire123 wrote: I have had my initial appointment with a radiation oncologist.  When he dicussed  the side effects of radiation on a left breast, I was not happy. I live in the Boston area and was wondering if anyone knows of a hospital where I could get radiation on a board which is designed to lie prone.  It would be greatly appreciated.
Posts.Title: Radiation treatment in a prone (face-down) position... otter whatsnext17
